sense.def:
Magic
je posebna moč, ki se pojavlja v pravljicah in v katero nekateri verjamejo. Po njeni zaslugi se uresničijo domnevno nemogoče stvari.

seg.quote: She was accused of inflicting bad fortune on them through evil magic.
How fast the magic potion worked!

sense.def:
Magic
je tudi spretnost izvajanja zvijač, s katerimi zabavamo ljudi, na primer tako, da dosežemo, da se stvari pojavljajo in izginjajo.

seg.quote: He was in his bedroom practising magic tricks.

sense.def:
The magic of something
je posebna lastnost nečesa, zaradi katere se zdi tisto čudovito in privlačno.

seg.quote: They need a bit of magic in their lives.
